trans-unit.source: Specifies the types of security available to a service endpoint configured to receive HTTP requests.
trans-unit.target: Specifica i tipi di sicurezza disponibili per un endpoint del servizio configurato per ricevere richieste HTTP.

trans-unit.source: WebHttpSecurity provides the security requirements for an endpoint configured with a <xref:System.ServiceModel.WebHttpBinding>.
trans-unit.target: WebHttpSecurity include i requisiti di sicurezza per un endpoint configurato con un <xref:System.ServiceModel.WebHttpBinding>.</xref:System.ServiceModel.WebHttpBinding>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.ServiceModel.WebHttpSecurityMode> value is specified by the <xref:System.ServiceModel.WebHttpBinding.%23ctor%28System.ServiceModel.WebHttpSecurityMode%29> method, then the settings provided by the <xref:System.ServiceModel.WebHttpSecurity.Transport%2A> property become effective for the service endpoint.
trans-unit.target: Se il <xref:System.ServiceModel.WebHttpSecurityMode>sia stato specificato per il <xref:System.ServiceModel.WebHttpBinding.%23ctor%28System.ServiceModel.WebHttpSecurityMode%29>(metodo), quindi le impostazioni fornite dal <xref:System.ServiceModel.WebHttpSecurity.Transport%2A>proprietà rese effettive per l'endpoint del servizio.</xref:System.ServiceModel.WebHttpSecurity.Transport%2A> </xref:System.ServiceModel.WebHttpBinding.%23ctor%28System.ServiceModel.WebHttpSecurityMode%29> </xref:System.ServiceModel.WebHttpSecurityMode>

trans-unit.source: The value of <xref:System.ServiceModel.WebHttpSecurityMode> can only be set in the <xref:System.ServiceModel.WebHttpBinding> constructor that takes it as an explicit parameter and its value cannot be set again after the binding instance is created.
trans-unit.target: Il valore di <xref:System.ServiceModel.WebHttpSecurityMode>può essere impostato solo nel <xref:System.ServiceModel.WebHttpBinding>costruttore che accetta come parametro esplicito e il relativo valore non può essere impostati nuovamente dopo la creazione di istanza dell'associazione.</xref:System.ServiceModel.WebHttpBinding> </xref:System.ServiceModel.WebHttpSecurityMode>

trans-unit.source: Creates a new instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.WebHttpSecurity"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Crea una nuova istanza di <xref href="System.ServiceModel.WebHttpSecurity"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the mode of security that is used by an endpoint configured to receive HTTP requests with a <xref href="System.ServiceModel.WebHttpBinding"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta la modalità di sicurezza utilizzato da un endpoint configurato per ricevere richieste HTTP con un <xref href="System.ServiceModel.WebHttpBinding"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: This property determines whether the settings from the <xref:System.ServiceModel.WebHttpSecurity.Transport%2A> property becomes effective.
trans-unit.target: Questa proprietà determina se le impostazioni di <xref:System.ServiceModel.WebHttpSecurity.Transport%2A>proprietà diventa effettivo.</xref:System.ServiceModel.WebHttpSecurity.Transport%2A>

trans-unit.source: A value of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.WebHttpSecurityMode"></xref> that indicates whether transport-level security or no security is used by an endpoint.
trans-unit.target: Il valore di <xref href="System.ServiceModel.WebHttpSecurityMode"> </xref> che indica se la sicurezza a livello di trasporto o nessuna sicurezza viene utilizzata da un endpoint.

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref href="System.ServiceModel.WebHttpSecurityMode"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Il valore predefinito è <xref href="System.ServiceModel.WebHttpSecurityMode"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The value is not a valid <xref href="System.ServiceModel.WebHttpSecurityMode"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Il valore non è valido <xref href="System.ServiceModel.WebHttpSecurityMode"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Specifies whether the <xref:System.ServiceModel.WebHttpSecurity.Mode*> property has changed from its default and should be serialized.
trans-unit.target: Specifica se il <xref:System.ServiceModel.WebHttpSecurity.Mode*>proprietà è stato modificato rispetto all'impostazione predefinita e deve essere serializzata.</xref:System.ServiceModel.WebHttpSecurity.Mode*>

trans-unit.source: This is used for XAML integration.
trans-unit.target: Viene utilizzato per l'integrazione XAML.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref:System.ServiceModel.WebHttpSecurity.Mode*> property value should be serialized; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se il <xref:System.ServiceModel.WebHttpSecurity.Mode*>valore della proprietà deve essere serializzato; in caso contrario, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.</xref:System.ServiceModel.WebHttpSecurity.Mode*>

trans-unit.source: Returns a value that indicates whether the Transport property has changed from its default value and should be serialized.
trans-unit.target: Restituisce un valore che indica se la proprietà del trasporto è stato modificato rispetto al valore predefinito e deve essere serializzata.

trans-unit.source: This is used by WCF for XAML integration.
trans-unit.target: Viene utilizzato da WCF per l'integrazione XAML.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref:System.ServiceModel.WebHttpSecurity.Transport*> property value should be serialized; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se il <xref:System.ServiceModel.WebHttpSecurity.Transport*>valore della proprietà deve essere serializzato; in caso contrario, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.</xref:System.ServiceModel.WebHttpSecurity.Transport*>

trans-unit.source: Gets an object that contains the transport-level security settings for this binding.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene un oggetto che contiene le impostazioni di sicurezza a livello di trasporto per questa associazione.

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.ServiceModel.HttpTransportSecurity> object returned by this property to set the transport security parameters for the <xref:System.ServiceModel.WebHttpBinding>.
trans-unit.target: Utilizzare l' <xref:System.ServiceModel.HttpTransportSecurity>oggetto restituito da questa proprietà per impostare i parametri di sicurezza del trasporto per <xref:System.ServiceModel.WebHttpBinding>.</xref:System.ServiceModel.WebHttpBinding> </xref:System.ServiceModel.HttpTransportSecurity>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.ServiceModel.WebHttpSecurityMode> or <xref:System.ServiceModel.WebHttpSecurityMode> value is specified by the <xref:System.ServiceModel.WebHttpBinding.%23ctor%28System.ServiceModel.WebHttpSecurityMode%29> method, then the settings provided by the Transport property become effective for the service endpoint.
trans-unit.target: Se il <xref:System.ServiceModel.WebHttpSecurityMode>o <xref:System.ServiceModel.WebHttpSecurityMode>sia stato specificato per il <xref:System.ServiceModel.WebHttpBinding.%23ctor%28System.ServiceModel.WebHttpSecurityMode%29>(metodo), quindi le impostazioni fornite dalla proprietà trasporto rese effettive per l'endpoint del servizio.</xref:System.ServiceModel.WebHttpBinding.%23ctor%28System.ServiceModel.WebHttpSecurityMode%29> </xref:System.ServiceModel.WebHttpSecurityMode> </xref:System.ServiceModel.WebHttpSecurityMode>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.ServiceModel.WebHttpSecurityMode> value is specified by the <xref:System.ServiceModel.WebHttpBinding.%23ctor%28System.ServiceModel.WebHttpSecurityMode%29> method, then the settings provided by the Transport property become effective for the service endpoint.
trans-unit.target: Se il <xref:System.ServiceModel.WebHttpSecurityMode>sia stato specificato per il <xref:System.ServiceModel.WebHttpBinding.%23ctor%28System.ServiceModel.WebHttpSecurityMode%29>(metodo), quindi le impostazioni fornite dalla proprietà trasporto rese effettive per l'endpoint del servizio.</xref:System.ServiceModel.WebHttpBinding.%23ctor%28System.ServiceModel.WebHttpSecurityMode%29> </xref:System.ServiceModel.WebHttpSecurityMode>

trans-unit.source: The value of <xref:System.ServiceModel.WebHttpSecurityMode> can only be set in the <xref:System.ServiceModel.WebHttpBinding> constructor that takes it as an explicit parameter and its value cannot be set again after the binding instance is created.
trans-unit.target: Il valore di <xref:System.ServiceModel.WebHttpSecurityMode>può essere impostato solo nel <xref:System.ServiceModel.WebHttpBinding>costruttore che accetta come parametro esplicito e il relativo valore non può essere impostati nuovamente dopo la creazione di istanza dell'associazione.</xref:System.ServiceModel.WebHttpBinding> </xref:System.ServiceModel.WebHttpSecurityMode>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ServiceModel.HttpTransportSecurity> for this binding.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.ServiceModel.HttpTransportSecurity>per questa associazione.</xref:System.ServiceModel.HttpTransportSecurity>

trans-unit.source: The default values set are a <xref:System.ServiceModel.HttpTransportSecurity.ClientCredentialType*> of <xref:System.ServiceModel.HttpClientCredentialType>, a <xref:System.ServiceModel.HttpTransportSecurity.ProxyCredentialType*> of <xref href="System.ServiceModel.HttpProxyCredentialType"></xref>, and <xref:System.ServiceModel.HttpTransportSecurity.Realm*> = "".
trans-unit.target: I valori predefiniti impostati sono un <> </> *> di <xref:System.ServiceModel.HttpClientCredentialType>, <> </> *> di <xref href="System.ServiceModel.HttpProxyCredentialType"> </xref>, e <xref:System.ServiceModel.HttpTransportSecurity.Realm*>= "".</xref:System.ServiceModel.HttpTransportSecurity.Realm*> </xref:System.ServiceModel.HttpClientCredentialType>
